New Records: England conceded the first goal in three consecutive Wembley games for the first time since November 1954
Key Match Events: Jon Dagur Thorsteinsson scored Iceland's winning goal
England struggled to break down Iceland's defense
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate emphasized the need for better out-of-possession performance
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate criticized the disjointed press and defensive lapses
England's defense was a concern with multiple injuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: Defensive issues and the need for improved pressing were highlighted
